title: ‘Strictly for beautiful Russian girls’? What new files allege about Epstein’s links to Hamptons nightclub promoters
summary_full: Newly revealed Justice Department documents expose Jeffrey Epstein's Hamptons operations, detailing how he used the exclusive locale for 'grooming.'  Young women were flown in for 'girls' weekends,' facilitated by wealthy local contacts and lavish parties. Emails suggest Epstein orchestrated travel and stays, with one tipster claiming local associates procured underage girls for him.
